humotica.name: HumoticaOS Protocol Stack
humotica.description: Complete HumoticaOS stack - AInternet (network), JIS (security), TIBET (audit)
humotica.author: HumoticaOS Team

rabel.name: RABEL MCP Server
rabel.description: Local-first AI memory with semantic search, graph relations, and Remote Mode for cross-machine AI communication
rabel.author: HumoticaOS Team

ainternet.name: AInternet Protocol
ainternet.description: Internet for AI - DNS (.aint domains), Email (I-Poll messaging), P2P communication between AI agents
ainternet.author: HumoticaOS Team

tibet.name: TIBET MCP Server
tibet.description: Transaction/Interaction-Based Evidence Trail - Trust & provenance for AI systems
tibet.author: HumoticaOS Team

kit-pm.name: Kit Package Manager
kit-pm.description: HumoticaOS Package Manager & AI Security Gateway - validates packages against JIS/SNAFT
kit-pm.author: HumoticaOS Team

inject-bender.name: Inject Bender MCP
inject-bender.description: Security Through Absurdity - Transform attacks into hiking boot advertisements
inject-bender.author: HumoticaOS Team

tibet-chip.name: TIBET Safety Chip
tibet-chip.description: Hardware-like AI Security at TPM Cost - virtual security chip for AI systems
tibet-chip.author: HumoticaOS Team

openai-bridge.name: OpenAI Bridge MCP
openai-bridge.description: Use OpenAI GPT/o1 from any MCP-compatible AI
openai-bridge.author: HumoticaOS Team

gemini-bridge.name: Gemini Bridge MCP
gemini-bridge.description: Use Google Gemini from any MCP-compatible AI
gemini-bridge.author: HumoticaOS Team

ollama-bridge.name: Ollama Bridge MCP
ollama-bridge.description: Use local LLMs (Ollama) from any MCP-compatible AI - no API keys needed
ollama-bridge.author: HumoticaOS Team

requirements.note: All packages work on Python 3.9+ with minimal dependencies
